sense.gloss: to quiet (a child, crowd, etc.), to quieten, to make quiet
to calm (one's nerves, excitement, etc.), to compose (oneself), to appease (someone's anger), to pacify, to settle (e.g. discord)
to suppress (a rebellion, riot, fire, etc.), to quell, to put down, to get under control
to relieve (a cough, pain, etc.), to soothe, to alleviate, to ease
to appease (a spirit, soul, etc.), to pacify, to soothe

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑怒↑↓いか↓りを|↑静↑↓しず↓める|のは↑心↑↓こころ↓からの↑謝罪↑↓しゃざい↓しかない。
sdata.e: Only a sincere apology will appease my anger.

sdata.j: ↑心↑↓こころ↓を|↑静↑↓しず↓める|ために↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑目↑↓め↓を↑閉↑↓と↓じた。
sdata.e: I closed my eyes to calm down.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑興奮↑↓こうふん↓を|↑静↑↓しず↓める|ために↑座↑↓すわ↓った。
sdata.e: He sat down to recover from his agitation.

sdata.j: ↑両親↑↓りょうしん↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓を|↑静↑↓しず↓める|のに↑成功↑↓せいこう↓した。
sdata.e: The parents succeeded in calming him down.
